fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.auth

Interface IAuthnService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAttachable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IPasswordAuthnService, IPlatformAuthnService

    @SystemService
 @PluginService
public interface IAuthnService
extends IAttachable
    An authentication service, capable of providing access control tickets based on information available in HTTP requests or from serialized tokens.

    Implementations may register additional services, such as implementations of IFilteringService, to be able to identify a user trying to access a protected address space, presumably after being authenticated (for example, checking cookies or HTTP headers).

    Thread safety: implementations are required to be safe for concurrent read/write access.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    REFLEXE Technologies

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      ITicket authenticate(String token)
      Authenticates a user and obtains an authorization ticket, using an existing ticket token.
      ITicket getTicketFor(IHttpServiceCall call)

      String getTicketKey()

      • Methods inherited from interface fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.IAttachable

        getAttachId, getAttachVersion

    • Method Detail

      • authenticate

        ITicket authenticate(String token)
              throws TicketTokenException
        Authenticates a user and obtains an authorization ticket, using an existing ticket token.

        If the local ticket instance has expired, this will automatically try to obtain a new instance from the connector. If an up-to-date ticket cannot be obtained, this will fail with an exception.

        Parameters:
        token - the non-null ticket token.
        Returns:
        the ticket matching the token, never null.
        Throws:
        TicketTokenException - if the token cannot be converted to a valid ticket.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        ITicket.getTicketToken()

      • getTicketFor

        ITicket getTicketFor(IHttpServiceCall call)
        Queries this authentication service when mapped to the address space of the call, to return the user authenticated for access to the specified resource.

        If the user has not yet provided suitable authentication information for the call, then this should return null (other authentication services, if available, will then be queried).

        If this authentication service finds authentication information for the call, and if it is invalid or expired, then null should be returned.

        Parameters:
        call - the incoming call that may require authentication.
        Returns:
        an authenticated ticket for an active user, or null.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        getTicketKey()

      • getTicketKey

        String getTicketKey()
        Gets the attribute key used by this authentication service to store serialized ticket tokens. Each authentication service should define a unique ticket key.
        Returns:
        the unique non-null ticket token attribute key.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        getTicketFor(fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.http.IHttpServiceCall)
